definitions.definition: A mammal of the order Proboscidea, having a trunk, and two large ivory tusks jutting from the upper jaw.
Used when counting to add length, so that each count takes about one second
definitions.example: Let's play hide and seek. I'll count. One elephant, two elephant, three elephant...

definitions.definition: A large size of paper, measuring 23 by 28 inches, or sometimes 22 by 30, or (double elephant paper) 26 by 40 inches.
